headline: Is Expand Energy (EXE) Among the Energy Stocks that Fell This Week?
summary: The share price of Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) fell by 1.72% between January 9 and January 16, 2026, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Lost the Most This Week.
